trends: There have been no other sightings in Mountain City
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Iridescent fluid-like very large flying object.
divs: Sighting DetailsI am a Certified Broadcast Meteorologist, and recieved an email this morning from a viewer with pictures of a UFO, and the person asked what it was. When I viewed the pictures, it was very similar to an experience I had in April 2007 while I was working in downtown Atlanta one night. At that time, we had many calls to the TV station, witnessing the same object. It was very large, about the size of a C140 aircraft, made no noise, and was at an altitude of about 10,000 feet. It moved ver fluid-like, and was iridescent in color. I tried to get a camera, but it had gone. Our viewer sent us this picture of the exact same thing seen in the skies, two years later. Do you have any idea what it is?
